headline: RAM OPTICAL OPTICAL VISION METROLOGY SYSTEM
description: Optical Vision Metrology System Year 2001    Featuring a 6" x 9" work area with a .5 micron resolution
categories.lvl2: Inspection Equipment  >  Optical Inspection Equipment > Other Optical Inspection
specstable:
Manufacturer Ram Optical
Model Datastar
Description Optical Vision Metrology System
Accessories High Magnification Microscope
Brightfield Objectives: 5x, 10x, 20x, 50x
Other Information Specifications:
XY Axis
  • Travel: 6" x 9"
  • Accuracy: ±.5 micron
  • Repeatability: ±1.5 micron
  • Maximum Work Piece Weight: 50lbs

    Z Axis
  • Travel: 6"
  • Accuracy: .5mm
  • Repeatability

    Optics
  • Programmable Optical Video Probe 30x to 170x
  • Microscope Option (described above)
  • In Plane Repeatability: ±.25 micron
  • Illumination: Reflected, Transmitted & Ring Light--Shared 150 Watt Source

    Software
  • Galaxy Version 3.3.107
Power Requirements 115 V 9.0 A 60 Hz 1 Phase
Year of Manufacture 2001
Exterior Dimensions
Width 32.000 in (81.3 cm)
Depth 34.000 in (86.4 cm)
Height 62.000 in (157.5 cm)
Weight 1,000 lb (454 kg)
